title: Janitor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Stephen's Episcopal Church (Halifax, NS) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: They asked me if I would be a good janitor. I sat down and they were very nice and we had a good chat and i told them I was a good janitor.
Interview Questions: Would you like to work here?

title: Director of Student Ministry Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at St. Stephen's Episcopal Church
Interview Descriptions: long, obscure, and slow in communicating. they did a phone interview, then it took about a month for a call back. came in for a panel interview with a search committee, which lasted 3 hours. then did several one on one interviews with the senior pastor, and other youth workers.
Interview Questions: tell us about a conflict and how you resolved it

title: Director of Annual Giving Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at St. Stephen's Episcopal Church (Washington, DC) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Good.  They asked many questions that i was able to answer easily. I met with a panel of individuals who asked questions about my job experience, educational experience, and knowledge of the fundraising industry.
